#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <iostream>
#define MAXN 4000005
 
using namespace std;
 
char P[MAXN];
int F[MAXN];
 
void fuckingood()
{
  int j = 0;
 
  F[0] = 0;
  printf("%d ", F[0]);
  for(int i = 1; P[i]; ++i)
  {
    while(1)
    {
      if(P[i] == P[j])
      { 
        j++; F[i] = j; 
        break; 
      }
 
      if(j == 0)
      { 
        F[i] = 0; 
        break; 
      }
 
      j = F[j - 1];
    }
 
    printf("%d ", F[i]);
  }
 
  printf("\n");
}
 
int main()
{
  scanf("%s", P);
  while(!(P[0] == 'E' && P[1] == 'n' && P[2] == 'd'))
  {
    fuckingood();
    scanf("%s", P);
  }
 
  return 0;
}
